data.utilizationMethod: Grip the ruler’s short end between thumb and index finger so the long edge projects ahead, then swing and tap the distant edge like fork tines

data.proxyObjectName: pair of black and yellow scissors
data.utilizationMethod: Close the blades, grasp one closed blade by its flat side between thumb and fingers, extend the index finger along its spine, and saw the closed blades across the shelf
Grip the metal key ring tab like a handle and swing the fob body in gentle spoon-lifting motions
Hold the cup upright on the desk with your free hand; dip the ruler tip inside the cup and swirl it around the inner wall in small circles near the bottom.
Place the sponge flat with the yellow side up; drive the tape straight down through the soft foam until it reaches the denser green scrubbing layer.
Hold the circular casing in the palm with thumb over the center, turn the tape outlet downward, and perform rapid shake motions
